skillTree.name: Fuelled by Blood
skillTree.description: Even when not feasting, the Beastmen taste blood on their lips, smell it on their fur, and want for more.

skillTree.name: Voice of the Dark Gods
skillTree.description: This Lord speaks with a dread booming voice â€“ a gift from his Dark Masters to ensure obedience.

skillTree.name: A Gathering of Nightmares
skillTree.description: An Elder Shaggoth is big and strong enough to keep even the most hideous and untamable of creatures on check

effects.description:
Weapon Strength: +5% for Monster units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon Strength: +10% for Monster units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Harbinger of the Gods
skillTree.description: As they rarely awake, the pressence of an Elder Shaggoth attracts all manner of followers of Chaos and monsters alike who consider him the embodiment of the Will of the Dark Gods

skillTree.name: Shadow Hide
skillTree.description: Chaos smiles upon them, granting unnatural and heretical defence against mortal machinations.

skillTree.name: Immortality
skillTree.description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say noâ€¦

effects.description: When normally killed in battle, this Lord will be wounded instead

skillTree.name: Father of Rage
skillTree.description: Shaggoths that join Beastmen herds are brutal creatures that exist only to massacre and devour their opponents and will charge through a storm of bullets and cannonballs if needed.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +15% when fighting against anything and everything

skillTree.name: Marked by Nurgle
skillTree.description: The Father of Plagues has happily embraced this one

skillTree.name: Blessings of Nurgle
skillTree.description: As the diseases in his bloated and fetid body evidence, the generosity of Grandfather Nurgle is boundless, and his gifts, infinite

skillTree.name: Marked by Khorne
skillTree.description: Such is the violence unleashed by this Shaggoth that even the Blood God looks him with approval.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +10% when fighting against anything and everything
Weapon strength: +15% when fighting against anything and everything
Weapon strength: +20% when fighting against anything and everything

skillTree.name: Blessings of Khorne
skillTree.description: The burning rage, unsatiable bloodthirst and eternally blood-drenched scales are surely the signs of KhorneÂ´s favor.

skillTree.name: Marked by Tzeench
skillTree.description: The Changer of Ways has identified this Shaggoth as a vital pawn in his new game and will protect him from enemy casters until the time to discard him comes

skillTree.name: Blessings of Tzeench
skillTree.description: Sometimes, the gifts of Tzeentch are not visible but to those who can perceive the Winds of Magic

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve: +10 per turn

skillTree.name: Marked by Slaneesh
skillTree.description: Thousands of years surrounded by the pain and suffering of his victoms have made this Shaggoth appreciate the delights that only the Dark Prince can provide.

skillTree.name: Blessings of Slaneesh
skillTree.description: This DoombullÂ´s body is decorated with of trophies and jewellery from the multitude of victims he has tortured and maimed in the name of the Dark Prince.

skillTree.name: Champion of Chaos
skillTree.description: Only destruction is left in the wake of the Doombull path.

skillTree.name: Favourite of the Gods
skillTree.description: The warp flows through this one, granting them powers beyond the mortal's dreams.

skillTree.name: Rampant Mutations
skillTree.description: Unnatural mutations are a gift from the ruinous powers, keeping the Shaggoth in the fray for longer.

skillTree.name: Bestial Strength
skillTree.description: The Shaggoth never skips leg day.

skillTree.name: Imposing Presence
skillTree.description: The very presence of the Shaggoth makes its enemies feel weak at the knees. No wonder they can't seem to hit it.

skillTree.name: Thick Skin
skillTree.description: The Shaggoth's thick skin is almost a second armor.

skillTree.name: Teeth, Claw and Steel
skillTree.description: No matter how, the Shaggoth will always find a way to tear you apart.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +10% when fighting against anything and everything
Weapon strength: +15% when fighting against anything and everything
Weapon strength: +20% when fighting against anything and everything

skillTree.name: Favour of the Dark Gods
skillTree.description: The growing list of victories brings the attention of those immesurably more powerful.

skillTree.name: Devastating Charge
skillTree.description: Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.

skillTree.name: Primal Instincts
skillTree.description: The desire to wreak havoc is innate, brought about not by choice but by sheer force of being.

skillTree.name: Unnatural Thirst
skillTree.description: It is never enough. The food, the drink, the slaughter. It is never, ever enough.

skillTree.name: Prized Horns
skillTree.description: He who locks horns with this master of the warherd does so at his own peril.

skillTree.name: Banquet of Flesh
skillTree.description: The stench of raw, rotten meat causes others to balk, but the warherd revels in the flesh and brawn.

skillTree.name: Martial Mastery (Skill Dump)
skillTree.description: When everything else fails, there is always studying the blade. (This skill can accept up to 20 Skill Points)

skillTree.name: Defensive Dedication (Skill Dump)
skillTree.description: Wielding the shield is better than returning on it. (This skill can accept up to 20 Skill Points)

skillTree.name: Ancestral Terror
skillTree.description: More than leading a Warherd, Shaggoths just charge against all enemies they can find knowing other Beastmen will follow them as fast as they can

skillTree.name: Culling the Weak
skillTree.description: Once a Shaggoth has taken control of a Warherd, only the strongest ungors and gors will be allowed to remain alive.

effects.description:
Melee Attack: +3 for melee Ungor and melee Gor units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon Strength: +3% for melee Ungor and melee Gor units
	(Lord's army)

Melee Attack: +6 for melee Ungor and melee Gor units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon Strength: +6% for melee Ungor and melee Gor units
	(Lord's army)

Melee Attack: +10 for melee Ungor and melee Gor units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon Strength: +9% for melee Ungor and melee Gor units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: First Into the Fray
skillTree.description: Shaggoths know that most Beastmen are unable to understand complicated strategies, but some can still be used to flank and surround the enemy.

effects.description:
Charge Bonus: +5 for Centigors and Chariots (Excluding Ranged)
	(Lord's army)

Weapon Strength: +3% for melee Ungor and melee Gor units
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +2% for melee Centigor and melee Chariot units
	(Lord's army)

Charge Bonus: +10 for Centigors and Chariots (Excluding Ranged)
	(Lord's army)

Weapon Strength: +6% for melee Ungor and melee Gor units
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +5% for melee Centigor and melee Chariot units
	(Lord's army)

Charge Bonus: +15 for Centigors and Chariots (Excluding Ranged)
	(Lord's army)

Weapon Strength: +9% for melee Ungor and melee Gor units
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +8% for melee Centigor and melee Chariot units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Cannon Fodder
skillTree.description: Shaggoths have a much better grasp of tactics than Beastmen and know that having some herds of shooters is useful when besieging a fortress or just to attract enemy fire.

effects.description:
Missile damage: +4% for Ungors and Centigors (Ranged)
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +3% for melee Ungor and Centigor units
	(Lord's army)

Missile damage: +8% for Ungors and Centigors (Ranged)
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +6% for melee Ungor and Centigor units
	(Lord's army)

Missile damage: +12% for Ungors and Centigors (Ranged)
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +10% for melee Ungor and Centigor units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Monsters of the Wilderness
skillTree.description: Shaggoths use this creatures to harass and distract the enemy so the Beastmen warriors can reach their lines and begin the massacre.

effects.description:
Weapon Strength: +4 for Warhound, Harpy and Razorgor units
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +2% for Warhounds, Harpies and Razorgor units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon Strength: +8 for Warhound, Harpy and Razorgor units
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +3% for Warhounds, Harpies and Razorgor units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon Strength: +12 for Warhound, Harpy and Razorgor units
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +5% for Warhounds, Harpies and Razorgor units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Might of the Dark Gods
skillTree.description: The presence of a Shaggoth pushes his best warriors -already extremely brutal and destructive by nature- to achieve even highest peaks of violence and wanton cruelty in the name of the Dark Gods.

effects.description:
Melee Attack: +3% for Bestigor and Minotaur units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon Strength: +4% for Bestigor and Minotaur units
	(Lord's army)

Melee Attack: +6% for Bestigor and Minotaur units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon Strength: +8% for Bestigor and Minotaur units
	(Lord's army)

Melee Attack: +10% for Bestigor and Minotaur units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon Strength: +12% for Bestigor and Minotaur units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Topplers of Civilisation
skillTree.description: When a Shaggoth gathers the biggest and most savage monsters, they form an unstoppable wall of mutated flesh, horns and claws that can level entire cities.

effects.description:
Missile Strength: +4% for Cygor units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon Strength: +4% for Cygor, Chaos Spawn and Giant units
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +4% for Cygor, Chaos Spawn, Jabberslythe, Ghorgon and Giant units
	(Lord's army)

Missile Strength: +8% for Cygor units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon Strength: +7% for Cygor, Chaos Spawn and Giant units
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +8% for Cygor, Chaos Spawn, Jabberslythe, Ghorgon and Giant units
	(Lord's army)

Missile Strength: +12% for Cygor units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon Strength: +10% for Cygor, Chaos Spawn and Giant units
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +12% for Cygor, Chaos Spawn, Jabberslythe, Ghorgon and Giant units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Call of Violence
skillTree.description: "We feel it. We all feel it. The pull to war. The tug of battle. The NEED to kill."

skillTree.name: Unrelenting Savagery
skillTree.description: The Beastman delights in constant fighting; in vicious, ceaseless brutality. It gives him purpose.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +5 for Ungor Spearmen Herd, Ungor Herd, Gor Herd, and Bestigor Herd units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +5 for Ungor Spearmen Herd, Ungor Herd, Gor Herd, and Bestigor Herd units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Physical resistance: 10% for Ungor Spearmen Herd, Ungor Herd, Gor Herd, and Bestigor Herd units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Creatures of the Herd
skillTree.description: The Beastmenâ€™s elite menagerie â€“ the brayherds â€“ slaughter all those caught in their savage, animalistic sights.

effects.description:
Speed: +10% for Centigors, Centigors (Great Weapons), Razorgor Herd, Razorgor Chariot, Tuskgor Chariot, Chaos Warhounds, and Harpies units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +12 for Centigors, Centigors (Great Weapons), Razorgor Herd, Razorgor Chariot, Tuskgor Chariot, Chaos Warhounds, and Harpies units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Missile resistance: 15% for Centigors, Centigors (Great Weapons), Razorgor Herd, Razorgor Chariot, Tuskgor Chariot, Chaos Warhounds, and Harpies units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Bestial Butchers
skillTree.description: Only a select few from a herd gain their Beastlord's acknowledgement â€“ a prize earned through the carnage and chaos they spread in battle.

effects.description:
Missile resistance: 15% for Chaos Spawn, Minotaurs, Giant, Jabberslythe, and Ghorgon units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +5 for Chaos Spawn, Minotaurs, Giant, Jabberslythe, and Ghorgon units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +10% for Chaos Spawn, Minotaurs, Giant, Jabberslythe, and Ghorgon units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Mage Hunter
skillTree.description: The stench of magic is palpable. No mage can stand in the midst of battle against the baying warherds.

effects.description:
Missile strength: +10% for Ungor Raiders, Centigors (Throwing Axes) and Cygor units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Reload time reduction: +10% for Ungor Raiders, Centigors (Throwing Axes), and Cygor units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Spell resistance: 15% for Ungor Raiders, Centigors (Throwing Axes), and Cygor units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Apocalyptic Vision
skillTree.description: In fitful dreams, he sees the end. The world collapsing in on itself, leaving nothing but ashes and aberration.

skillTree.name: Gargantuan Hooves
skillTree.description: The ground shakes. The earth moves. The spirit trembles. The Beastman comes.

skillTree.name: Feasting Upon Man
skillTree.description: For those who face the warherd, a fate worse than death awaits their salivating jaws and unremitting bloodlust.

skillTree.name: Blessed by Evil
skillTree.description: Unknowingly, the Beastmen serve their dark and Ruinous Gods, who in turn bless their every action.

effects.description: Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +10%
Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +20%
Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +30%

skillTree.name: Foetid Gallipot
skillTree.description: A pungent mix of fell unguents ensures the unholy vitality of oneâ€™s minions.

effects.description:
Attrition: -10% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

Attrition: -20% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

Attrition: -30% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Ruination
skillTree.description: "This stinking mortal Hold will fall, my masters have foreseen it. Bring them ruin!"

effects.description:
Attrition suffered by defender: +5% when laying siege or encircling
	(local region)

Attrition suffered by defender: +10% when laying siege or encircling
	(local region)

Attrition suffered by defender: +15% when laying siege or encircling
	(local region)

skillTree.name: Unholy Resilience
skillTree.description: This willing servant of the Ruinous Powers has a resilience that is beyond any mortal measure.

effects.description:
Casualty replenishment rate: +30% for this Lord
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Lightning Strike
skillTree.description: "The time to strike is now!"

effects.description: Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present

skillTree.name: Corruption
skillTree.description: With the servants of Chaos comes the corruption - as the landscape twists, this one speeds the transformation.

skillTree.name: Gathering of Beasts
skillTree.description: When the warherd gathers, there is much feasting, debauchery, and revelling in mania and depravity.

skillTree.name: Foul Premonitions
skillTree.description: Brought into this world by the cataclysm of Chaos, Beastmen are the very image of a dread future.

effects.description: Chance of intercepting an army using the Underway, beast-paths or Worldroots: +10%
Chance of intercepting an army using the Underway, beast-paths or Worldroots: +5%
Chance of intercepting an army using the Underway, beast-paths or Worldroots: +10%

skillTree.name: Children of Chaos
skillTree.description: They bray beneath the weird, green moon, and do their perverse, grim butchery in the name of the heretical Gods.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +25% chance of wounding aggressors

backgroundSkills.name: Booze Cravings
backgroundSkills.description: Some beings just don't know when to put the bottle down.

backgroundSkills.name: Khorne's Fury
backgroundSkills.description: More than mere bloodlust, this one is filled with the primal, Ruinous rage of the Lord of Battle.

backgroundSkills.name: Nurgle's Foul Stink
backgroundSkills.description: This one has something of the compost heap about themâ€¦

backgroundSkills.name: Torment Utterances
backgroundSkills.description: The Dark Tongue is an apt medium through which to torment, mock and enrage the foe.

backgroundSkills.name: Unsated Bloodthirst
backgroundSkills.description: Sometimes, letting so much blood that the soil itself is stained just isn't enough. And it will never be.

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +10% for Minotaur units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Cunning
backgroundSkills.description: Deceit is a perfectly acceptable means of attack.

effects.description:
Ambush success chance: +10%
	(armies in local owned region)

backgroundSkills.name: Determined
backgroundSkills.description: Having a modicum of resolve is useful in a world that continually tests it.

backgroundSkills.name: Confident
backgroundSkills.description: Self-belief is a fine thing when not misplaced.

backgroundSkills.name: Disciplined
backgroundSkills.description: Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.

backgroundSkills.name: Perceptive
backgroundSkills.description: Although actually reading minds is not in their skillset, this one has extraordinary insight into the motives of others.

backgroundSkills.name: Aggressive
backgroundSkills.description: If you're gonna die, you may as well die with your boots on.

backgroundSkills.name: Tough
backgroundSkills.description: Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.

backgroundSkills.name: Weapon Master
backgroundSkills.description: If you can swing, slash, stab, gouge, or shoot it, this warrior has mastered every aspect of its use.

backgroundSkills.name: Strategist
backgroundSkills.description: This being has a plan - not just a game plan, but a master plan to achieve their long-term aims.

backgroundSkills.name: Tactician
backgroundSkills.description: Careful planning, knowledge of the terrain and the weaknesses of the enemy are the key to victory.
